tools.name: add-text-guide
tools.description:
Creates a versatile text guide with support for multiple widget types (text, images, dividers, FAQ/accordions, callouts, guide references, iframes, videos), theme support, and flexible layouts. Supports image uploading via base64-encoded data in the 'images' array parameter.

DESIGN GUIDELINES (follow these for well-structured, pedagogically sound guides):
- Layout: Max 4 cells per row. Place images in the same section as their explanatory text (text 60% width, image 40%).
- Structure: One concept per section. Use 5-9 sections for optimal learning. Enable showTOC for guides with 5+ sections.
- Opening: Start with a callout (style: 'info') listing learning objectives or what the reader will gain.
- Closing: End with a callout (style: 'success') summarizing key takeaways.
- Signaling: Use callout cells (tip/warning/info) to highlight key points. Bold important terms in text cells.
- Self-assessment: Add FAQ cells at section ends with comprehension questions so readers can test their understanding.
- Visual rhythm: Alternate section backgrounds between #FFFFFF and @secondaryColor for readability.
- Tone: Use second person ('you') for a conversational, learner-friendly tone.
- Coherence: Every cell should serve a learning goal. Minimize decorative dividers. If a video explains a concept, keep adjacent text brief.
- Segmenting: Break complex content into learner-paced chunks with clear section titles.

collectionDescription.description: Description for the new collection (for 'create' mode)

groupBy.description: How to group guides: 'topic', 'keyphrase', 'type', or 'similarity' (for 'auto-organize' mode)

minGuidesPerCollection.description: Minimum guides required to form a collection (default: 3)

maxCollections.description: Maximum number of collections to suggest (default: 10)

tools.name: smart-topic-assignment
tools.description: Analyzes guide content and suggests optimal topic assignments. Uses AI to match content with existing topics based on subject matter, keywords, and topic hierarchy. Can optionally apply suggested assignments.

guideId.description: The ID of the guide to analyze for topic suggestions

maxSuggestions.description: Maximum number of topic suggestions to return (default: 5)

applyTopics.description: Whether to automatically apply the top suggested topics to the guide

maxToApply.description: Maximum number of topics to apply if applyTopics is true (default: 3)

includeSubtopics.description: Whether to include subtopics in suggestions

excludeCurrentTopics.description: Whether to exclude topics the guide is already assigned to

tools.name: content-gap-report
tools.description: Generates a comprehensive content gap analysis report identifying topics with high demand but insufficient content. Provides prioritized recommendations for content creation based on search patterns, user needs, and topic coverage.

days.description: Number of days to analyze search data (default: 30)

topicIDs.description: Filter by topic IDs. Use get-topics tool to see available categories

limit.description: Maximum number of gap items to report (default: 15)

includeRecommendations.description: Whether to include AI-powered content creation recommendations

tools.name: optimize-keyphrases
tools.description: Analyzes guide content and suggests optimized keyphrases to improve search discoverability. Can analyze current keyphrases, suggest additions, and identify irrelevant phrases to remove.

guideId.description: The ID of the guide to optimize keyphrases for

maxSuggestions.description: Maximum number of keyphrase suggestions (default: 10, max: 20)

analyzeSearchPatterns.description: Include analysis of search patterns for this guide's topics

updateGuide.description: Update the guide's keyphrases with the suggestions

language.description: Language for keyphrase analysis (e.g., 'en', 'sv'). Defaults to guide's language.

tools.name: generate-training-report
tools.description: Generates a comprehensive training status report for management. Includes course completion rates, user progress, group performance, and compliance status. Supports filtering by date range, groups, and courses.

days.description: Number of days to include in the report (default: 30)

reportType.description: Report type: 'summary' (overview), 'detailed' (full breakdown), 'compliance' (focus on mandatory training), 'performance' (group comparison)

groupIds.description: Optional list of group IDs to filter by

courseIds.description: Optional list of course IDs to filter by

tools.name: training-needs-analysis
tools.description: Analyzes user performance and training history to identify skills gaps and recommend training assignments. Can analyze individuals, groups, or organization-wide training needs.

userId.description: Analyze training needs for a specific user (optional)

groupId.description: Analyze training needs for a specific group (optional)

includeSkillsGaps.description: Analyze assessment results for skills gaps

limit.description: Maximum number of users to analyze (default: 50, max: 100)

tools.name: design-push-training
tools.description: Design a Push Training campaign with AI assistance. Analyzes content and suggests optimal guide selection, target audience, and scheduling based on campaign objectives. Provide a campaign name, learning objectives, and optionally specify target groups or topics.

campaignName.description: Name for the Push Training campaign

objectives.description: Learning objectives or goals for this campaign (describe what learners should achieve)

targetGroupIds.description: Target group IDs for the campaign audience (optional)

topicIds.description: Topic IDs to source guides from (optional)

includeSuggestions.description: Whether to include AI-generated content and audience suggestions

tools.name: analyze-training-completion
tools.description: Analyze training completion rates across users and groups. Identifies users with incomplete training, calculates completion percentages, and suggests interventions for compliance improvement.

courseId.description: LMS Course ID to analyze (leave empty for all courses)

groupId.description: Group ID to filter analysis (leave empty for all groups)

daysSinceEnrollment.description: Only include users enrolled at least this many days ago (default: 7)

includeUserDetails.description: Include individual user completion details (may be slow for large groups)

identifyAtRisk.description: Identify users at risk of non-compliance (not started or low progress)

limit.description: Maximum number of incomplete users to return (default: 50)

tools.name: list-skills
tools.description: Lists all available agent skills that can be activated for AI-assisted workflows. Skills are markdown-based AI capability packages.

category.description: Optional category filter: CREATE, ANALYZE, REPORT, MANAGE, SKILLS

query.description: Optional search query to filter skills by name, description, or tags

tools.name: get-skill-details
tools.description: Gets detailed information about a specific agent skill including its files, metadata, and usage instructions.

skillId.description: The skill ID to get details for (e.g., 'rwa-agent-skill')

tools.name: activate-skill
tools.description: Activates an agent skill by loading its methodology and templates into the conversation context for interactive use. Use this when the user wants to work with a skill interactively.

includeSupporting.description: Whether to include supporting files (templates, guides) in the activation

tools.name: use-skill
tools.description: Executes an agent skill with specific input content for automated workflow execution. The skill's methodology is applied to analyze or process the provided input.

inputContent.description: The content to analyze or process using the skill methodology

instructions.description: Additional instructions or context for the skill execution (optional)
